long_description: Rugged, athletic and quick to slide on and off, the Jambu Roadrunner shoes will easily become your favorite everyday slip-on. Bungee straps provide easy adjustability. Mesh materials offer exceptional breathability. Memory foam footbeds conform to the unique contours of your feet for all-day comfort. Nonmarking, partially recycled rubber outsoles provide excellent grip and durability. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Rugged, athletic and quick to slide on and off, the Jambu Roadrunner shoes will easily become your favorite everyday slip-on.
